UAMediaEventTemplate Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in UAMediaEventTemplate.h

Overview

A UAMediaEventTemplate represents a custom media event template for the application.

Tasks

  • + browsedTemplate
  • + starredTemplate
  • + sharedTemplate
  • + sharedTemplateWithSource:withMedium:
  • + consumedTemplate
  • + consumedTemplateWithValueFromString:

  •   isFeature property
  •   author property
  •   publishedDate property
  • – createEvent

Properties

author

The event’s author. The author’s length must not exceed 255 characters or it will invalidate the event.

@property (nonatomic, copy, nullable) NSString *author

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

category

The event’s category. The category’s length must not exceed 255 characters or it will invalidate the event.

@property (nonatomic, copy, nullable) NSString *category

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

eventDescription

The event’s description. The description’s length must not exceed 255 characters or it will invalidate the event.

@property (nonatomic, copy, nullable) NSString *eventDescription

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

identifier

The event’s ID. The ID’s length must not exceed 255 characters or it will invalidate the event.

@property (nonatomic, copy, nullable) NSString *identifier

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

isFeature

YES if the event is a feature, else NO.

@property (nonatomic, assign) BOOL isFeature

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

publishedDate

The event’s publishedDate. The publishedDate’s length must not exceed 255 characters or it will invalidate the event.

@property (nonatomic, copy, nullable) NSString *publishedDate

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

type

The event’s type. The type’s length must not exceed 255 characters or it will invalidate the event.

@property (nonatomic, copy, nullable) NSString *type

Class Methods

browsedTemplate

Factory method for creating a browsed content event template.

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

consumedTemplate

Factory method for creating a consumed content event template.

+ (instancetype)consumedTemplate

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

consumedTemplateWithValue:

Factory method for creating a consumed content event template with a value.

+ (instancetype)consumedTemplateWithValue:(nullable NSNumber *)eventValue

Parameters

eventValue

The value of the event. The value must be between -231 and 231 - 1 or it will invalidate the event.

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

consumedTemplateWithValueFromString:

Factory method for creating a consumed content event template with a value.

+ (instancetype)consumedTemplateWithValueFromString:(nullable NSString *)eventValue

Parameters

eventValue

The value of the event as as string. The value must be between -231 and 231 - 1 or it will invalidate the event.

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

sharedTemplate

Factory method for creating a shared content event template.

+ (instancetype)sharedTemplate

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

sharedTemplateWithSource:withMedium:

Factory method for creating a shared content event template. If the source or medium exceeds 255 characters it will cause the event to be invalid.

+ (instancetype)sharedTemplateWithSource:(nullable NSString *)source withMedium:(nullable NSString *)medium

Parameters

source

The source as an NSString.

medium

The medium as an NSString.

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h

starredTemplate

Factory method for creating a starred content event template.

+ (instancetype)starredTemplate

Declared In

UAMediaEventTemplate.h
